title: Mecha Malphite Cost Glitched
body: So i bought the mecha malphite skin and it charged me double. RITO plz help i want a refund

replies.body:
Hey PadSec,

Have you relogged your client to verify it's not a visual bug? 

Otherwise, please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584), and we'll take a look at your account and make the adjustment.
